TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Bot.Schema.Teams.MessagingExtensionResult> QueryHandlerAsync<TState>(ITurnContext turnContext, TState turnState, Query<Dictionary<string,object>> query, CancellationToken cancellationToken) where TState : TurnState;
.class public auto ansi sealed QueryHandlerAsync`1<(class Microsoft.Teams.AI.State.TurnState) TState> extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function QueryHandlerAsync(Of TState)(turnContext As ITurnContext, turnState As TState, query As Query(Of Dictionary(Of String, Object)), cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task(Of MessagingExtensionResult)
type QueryHandlerAsync<'State (requires 'State :> TurnState)> = delegate of ITurnContext * 'State * Query<Dictionary<string, obj>> * CancellationToken -> Task<MessagingExtensionResult>

Docs.typeparam: Type of the turn state. This allows for strongly typed access to the turn state.
Docs.param: A strongly-typed context object for this turn.
The turn state object that stores arbitrary data for this turn.
The query parameters that were sent by the client.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Docs.summary: Function for handling Message Extension query events.
